group.label: Search Adapter
group.comment: These advanced settings belong to the Algolia_SearchAdapter module

field.label: Disable Elasticsearch (or OpenSearch)
field.comment:
If you are using Algolia for both your browse and search experiences then it will not be necessary to use Elasticsearch. Select this option if you wish to use your Algolia indices for all product data retrieval. This will prevent future indexing to Elasticsearch via the catalogsearch_fulltext index and even backend rendering will now be performed by building your results from the Algolia index.
⚠ This setting depends on the configuration defined at catalog/search/engine.
